title: Interpretation of tomatoes in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: As for seeing rotten or sour tomatoes, it may not look good. As for green tomatoes, they vary according to vision. In this article from our website gptafser.com/, we will provide an interpretation of the vision in all cases, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream for one girl. Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of her marriage to a God-fearing man of good character. If a girl sees tomatoes with worms in them In a dream, the vision indicates that there are many problems in her relationship with her lover. Or perhaps her fiancé broke up with him and the relationship was not completed. To see in a girl’s dream that she is eating inappropriate tomatoes indicates the death of someone dear to her. And if the girl suffers from an illness and sees herself in a dream eating Tomatoes. The vision indicates her recovery, unlike her eating rotten tomatoes, which indicates an increase in illness. If a girl sees that she is going to the market to buy tomatoes, the vision indicates that she will attend a happy occasion. Seeing tomato seeds in a dream for a single woman is a sign that there More than one person they want to be officially associated with. Cutting tomatoes with a sharp tool in a dream for a single woman. It shows her strong personality and the inability of anyone to cross their boundaries with her, even if he is her fiancé. Scientists explain the vision of eating tomatoes in an engaged girl’s dream. Good news that her engagement She ended up getting married, and she will live a happy life with her partner, God willing. If an unmarried woman sees that she is giving people tomatoes, this is a sign of her good reputation among the people. See also: Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream for a married woman Buying tomatoes in a dream A woman indicates the entry of sustenance and blessings into her life in the coming days, God willing. Seeing tomatoes in a woman’s dream symbolizes the qualities that the dreamer has, such as purity of heart and love for people. If a young woman sees red tomatoes in a dream, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon, and perhaps She is already pregnant, and God knows best. But if a woman sees herself giving her husband tomatoes, this is evidence of prosperity and a peaceful married life. If a woman sees someone she knows in a dream, she gives them tomatoes to eat. It indicates obtaining a benefit from this person. Seeing him in a dream He eats tomatoes greedily due to hunger. Poverty indicates the dreamer’s need for money in order to buy his basic needs of food and drink. Interpretation of seeing cut tomatoes in a woman’s dream. In a good way, she keeps control and manages her home well. Eating tomato juice in a woman’s dream is an indication However, you will hear good news or attend happy occasions. If a woman sees rotten tomatoes in a dream, she must be careful not to fall into a trap from someone in the circle of relatives or acquaintances. If a woman sees rotten tomatoes in her home and gets rid of them, the vision indicates that God will save her. Of magic planned or for a loved one. Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream about a man and its meaning: Dreaming of a man eating tomato seeds indicates a change in his financial circumstances.

title: Seeing the dead die again by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing dead people dying again is one of the visions that cause strangeness and anxiety in the dreamer’s heart, especially in the case that the deceased is close to him and loved by him, and in fact there are many interpretations and meanings included in the vision, some of which serve as food and kindness that comes to the dreamer, and others are a warning about something he is doing wrong. Seeing the dead dying again. If you dream of the deceased dying again, this symbolizes how close the deceased was to the dreamer, his longing for him, and his inability to overcome the pain of separation. Dreaming of dying for the second time means that the dreamer will be exposed to some events that will change his life to a great extent that he will not expect. The dead person dies again in a dream, and this may symbolize that he is suffering from many pressures in his life that cause him fear and anxiety and make him unable to do anything. Seeing the deceased dying again is evidence that the dreamer will move to a state different from his current state and his life will be different. Full of blessings and good deeds. Seeing the dead dying again by Ibn Sirin If we dream of a dead person dying according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, this may symbolize a great need for alms and begging from the dead and the dream is an indication of the new stage that the dreamer will experience during the coming period and its arrival. In a different place. Seeing the dead person dying again is evidence of the many crises and experiences that the dreamer faces in his life and his inability to find a suitable solution to get rid of them all. Seeing the deceased person dying again is a symbol that the dreamer may experience the loss of a loved one and bury him, and this will make him He lives in a state of severe pain.Seeing the dead dying again for the single When a dream about a deceased person dies in a girl’s dream, this indicates that the dreamer will undergo some changes in her life which will be the main reason for her transition to another state.Watching a girl in a dream that there is a dead person dying, This means that there is a high probability that the dreamer will marry in the coming period to a young man close to the deceased, and the dream may be an indication that the dreamer will suffer in her life from some judgments that may be material. The dream of the dead who dies in the dreamer’s dream indicates that she is going through some obstacles and hurdles. On her way to achieving her goals and dreams, this causes her sadness and despair. Seeing the dead dying again for the married woman. The deceased died again in the woman’s dream, which indicates that the dreamer is suffering from some disagreements with her partner’s family, and the dream is evidence that she and her husband are facing some financial crises. Seeing a woman suffering from some complications in the matter of pregnancy and her father dying for the second time, this is good news that God will soon give her a child. If the dreamer sees the dead person dying again in his dream, this expresses the pressures and difficulties that she is going through and that he bears a great responsibility that she cannot bear. Vision The dead die again for a pregnant woman. Seeing a dead pregnant woman dying again in her sleep is evidence that she will move to another state and a new stage, and this causes her anxiety and stress. Seeing a pregnant woman dying again in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing a beautiful girl in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a beautiful child in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, is that dreams are a group of fantasies that happen to a person during sleep, and these dreams differ in the strength of their coherence and the logic of their events, as dreams are divided into two parts, the first is dreams, which are dreams of weak and illogical coherence and have no explanation, and the second part It is a vision that concerns events that are closer to reality and have an explanation, and many people search for an explanation for them. Seeing a beautiful child in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a beautiful child by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most prominent imams and dream interpreters in the Arab world, as he interpreted many of the dreams that people dream about, and here we mention the interpretation of Ibn Sirin seeing a beautiful child in a dream: The dreamer sees a beautiful child. In his sleep, new beginnings are coming to him. If the dreamer sees a beautiful baby girl in his dream, this may indicate the collapse of worries and anxiety, and God knows best. Seeing a beautiful baby may indicate great wealth or a new job position. As for seeing a sad baby in a dream, this indicates problems and obstacles. Which the dreamer will face, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a beautiful child in a dream for a single woman. Interpretations of dreams vary according to the dreamer, whether he is a man or a woman, and the difference in details in the dream changes the interpretation of the dream, and here we will convey the interpretation of dreaming of a beautiful child in a dream: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a boy Beautiful, this is evidence of kindness and nourishment, and God knows best. It may also indicate his vision of forgiveness of sins, disobedience, or travel, and trust in God. If she sees that she is carrying a beautiful child in a dream, this is evidence of the presence of a man who loves her. And if she sees a beautiful child who loves her, this indicates her marriage to a man. Nabil loves her very much. The interpretation of seeing a beautiful child in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of a dream about seeing a beautiful child for a married woman differs from the interpretation for an unmarried girl, as interpretations differ according to the woman’s social status, and here we mention the interpretation of a dream about seeing a beautiful child for a married woman: If a married woman sees a beautiful child in Her dream, this means abundant food, but if she is late in pregnancy, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. Seeing a married woman breastfeeding a beautiful child whom she does not know suggests that she will be deceived by someone close to her. If a married woman sees a sad child in her dream, this indicates To the presence of marital problems. The interpretation of seeing a beautiful child in a dream for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of a dream about seeing a beautiful child in a dream for a pregnant woman differs from the rest of the interpretations of other social situations in women, according to what the interpreters say, and the interpretation is as follows: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is pregnant A male child, this is evidence that the fetus is female, and God knows best. The interpretation may be that the abundance of sustenance for her and her family depends on the beauty of the child she is carrying. Dreams have different interpretations depending on the person who dreams of them and their different social status. They differ according to the details in the dream and Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream. A beautiful baby in a dream is one of the positive dreams that bring happiness to him. H

title: Interpretation of a dream about escape and fear

preview.html: One of the dreams that the sleeper sees most is the dream of flying, as it seems strange to a person to see himself flying in the air unable to control his directions or that he wants to go somewhere, and this action can be accompanied by fear or confirmation. The encyclopedia provides an interpretation of seeing flying in a dream according to what was narrated by distinguished dream interpretation scholars, including the scholar Muhammad bin Sirin and other prestigious scholars about the unmarried and married woman and the indications of good and evil. It contains this vision. The dream of flying Ibn Sirin says about seeing flying in a dream: Flying lightly without fear from one place to another means traveling for work, profit and high status among the dreamer's surroundings. Flying high without the ability to control the height or stop it indicates fears and problems. Flying with white wings covering the dreamer's body symbolizes a change in state to prosperity and happiness. Flying with a white feather on the dreamer's body indicates a trip to perform the Hajj or Umrah. Flying over the sea shows what the dreamer will gain from unlimited good and progress in life. Falling into the sea while flying over it is a vision that portends failure and failure. Fighting on a trip with a person known to the dreamer in a dream and winning against him indicates the extent to which the dreamer will achieve victories over his competitors more than he expected or desired. Interpretation of a dream of flying for a single girl There are many different interpretations related to seeing a single woman flying in a dream, which we present as follows: An unmarried woman flying from the top of her house in a dream to land on the roof of her neighbor's house indicates the dreamer's desire to marry one of the residents of this property And that this desire will come true soon. A random flight without a single person being able to control himself portends trouble. The dreamer having two wings during the flight symbolizes the presence of someone who cares about her and her success and tries to support and make her happy. The inability to fly symbolizes a lack of self-confidence and weak decision-making skills. Interpretation of a dream about flying over the sea for a married woman Seeing a married woman flying has multiple meanings that often indicate good and rarely indicate evil and evil. We explain this in the following article: A married woman flying and floating over the sea, feeling happy, symbolizes her success in raising her children and managing her household affairs. A married woman flying over the sea and then falling into it symbolizes the failure and disappointment felt by the dreamer. A married woman flying with a white feather shows the husband supporting and providing for his wife. A married woman escaping in a white dress is good news for her to perform the Hajj pilgrimage. Flying high and then falling to the ground symbolizes recovery from illness by the grace of God. Flying in a steady and straight path symbolizes the woman's good condition and good behavior. Interpretation of a dream about escaping and fear Flying in an irregular and chaotic manner with a feeling of fear indicates that the dreamer is committing sins and fears being exposed and people will know about them. The dreamer throws his bed out of fear of unpleasant visions, and the dreamer must supplicate to God Almighty to pay his distress and sadness. In the following article we presented

title: What is the interpretation of a dream that I am pregnant and my stomach is large?

preview.html: I dreamed that I was pregnant and my stomach was big. It is very normal for a woman to experience weight gain and an enlarged abdomen as the pregnancy progresses, and the enlarged abdomen can increase significantly in the last third of pregnancy. Sometimes a woman may dream when she stops at the beginning of pregnancy that her stomach is large, so what does this dream indicate. Today and until today, different, we will explain. I dreamed that I was pregnant and I had a large stomach. What are the interpretations of this dream? Follow us. I dreamed that I was pregnant and had a large stomach. Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted a person’s vision of himself with a large stomach. As if he is pregnant as evidence of the abundance of nutrition he will receive. Whoever dreams of seeing an old woman who is pregnant, this indicates that he is a person who neglects other matters and is preoccupied with the world. If a person dreams that he has a large stomach and is looking for a job, this means that he will face many problems until he finds a job, and God knows best. The scholar Ibn Sirin said: This vision is related to a person, and if his life is stable, this indicates the abundance of goodness that he will attain. A person dreams that he is pregnant and his belly is large, but he gives birth, then this indicates that this person will be saved from all problems, worries, and debts, if any, and if he is sick. He was cured, and God knows best. Better. I dreamed that I was pregnant and my stomach was large for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is pregnant and her stomach is large, then this dream indicates that this dreaming girl will have a wonderful job opportunity and an excellent position. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is pregnant with a large stomach and has reached a stage Giving birth, it means that this girl will be relieved of all her worries and problems. I dreamed that I was pregnant and my stomach was big. This vision in the life of a single girl may indicate that this girl is looking for more success and dreams, but she finds many obstacles in her way. This dream in the dream of an unmarried girl may indicate that there is a weight weighing on her chest and that she is living in a state of anxiety, tension and fear for The future, and God knows best. As for an unmarried girl’s dream that she is pregnant with twins and her belly is large, this indicates that her dreams will come true, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was pregnant and had a large belly for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she is pregnant and her belly is large, this means that she is facing problems in her married life, and God knows best. If a married woman dreams that she is pregnant and her belly is large, this means that she is going through a financial crisis and that she is suffering from debt, and God knows best. If a married woman dreams that she is pregnant and her belly is large, and she gives birth to a baby girl, then this indicates the good and abundant livelihood that awaits her. If a married woman dreams that she is pregnant Her belly is large and she is in fact pregnant, so this may indicate that her due date is approaching and that she is anxious and stressed. If a married woman dreams that she is pregnant and her belly is large, but she was trying to get rid of it, then this dream shows secrets that the woman is hiding from her husband, or it may be a religion that she is getting rid of. Who: I dreamed that I was pregnant and my stomach was large for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams that her stomach is large and pregnant in a dream, this indicates that this woman’s birth is imminent, and God knows best. If a woman sees that she is pregnant, a boy will be born.

title: Interpretation of henna in a dream for a single girl

preview.html: Henna vision in a dream for a girl who sees henna on her hand and hair and henna engraved in a dream on her leg and foot and more for Ibn Sirin Henna in a dream is one of the strange dreams that we see in dreams in a very different way, it does not appear to us in many dreams, but it appears greatly in the dreams of girls who wear henna a lot, as henna is one of the things that women use to decorate by adding many shapes and drawings to the hands. Below, we will look at you in our article today in the interpretation of seeing henna in a dream for the translator Ibn Sirin, who explained it completely to all people. Interpretation of henna in a dream Henna for single women has many connotations, the most important of which is marriage. If a girl sees that she is putting henna on her hand, she is about to get engaged. Putting henna on the hair is a sign of the approaching wedding date, and henna engraved on the man or man or foot is a sign of travel. If you are single and you see henna engravings in your dream and feel joy and happiness while engraving them, this symbolizes that you will get married soon and you will be happy with henna engravings for brides. If you are single and you see engravings Henna in a dream without feeling happy, this warns you of an unwanted marriage. Seeing henna tattoos on others symbolizes the bliss of the heart, happiness, and a sense of calm and peace. If you are married and see henna tattoos in a dream, then goodness in work, living, and legitimate money will go to your husband, which will make the family financially comfortable in the next stage. If you see henna tattoos on the palms of your hands, this means that you will soon become pregnant and give birth. Writing henna on the feet is a sign of exile and travel for you or a friend or relative. Seeing henna indicates kindness, and pleasant events will come to the seer, as well as happy news. The owner of this vision will meet good luck and get married. Joy will fill his days and the dreamer will achieve all his hopes. From an Islamic point of view, it indicates that the dreamer fulfills God’s call. If the dreamer of this vision is a woman, this is a sign that her husband loves and appreciates her very much. Seeing henna engraving on the hand and wearing this engraving indicates that the dreamer will face problems with his children. Seeing a man drawing henna means that the dreamer will gain great fame related to his professional life, and if he is single, he will be engaged. Seeing henna on a man’s palm indicates that the dreamer will have large amounts of money and investments. Seeing henna in a dream also indicates a hidden energy from a man or woman. Seeing henna in the beard indicates that the dreamer follows the Sunnah of God and His Messenger and that he performs the duties of his religion without deficiency and at the same time provides assistance to those in need. Seeing henna on the head shows the strength of the dreamer and the defeat of his enemies and that he will fulfill all his demands. Interpretation of henna in a dream by Ibn Sirin If an unmarried girl sees her fingers painted with henna in a dream, this means that she is affectionate and kind. Seeing a girl who colors her fingers with henna in The dream is evidence of her closeness to God and her seeking His forgiveness. Seeing a girl putting henna on her hair in the dream

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 190 in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the number 190 in a dream for a single girl: Seeing the number 190 in an unmarried girl’s dream means happiness, livelihood, and many blessings, and God knows best. This number 190 is considered a positive indicator that the girl is on the right path to achieving her dreams, God willing. The number 190 means that the girl often starts things and works Without finishing it and it remains useless in her life. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the number 100 in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the number 190 in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the number 190 in a dream for a married woman means attaining goodness and blessing, and blessing in health and children, and God knows best. This number represents 190. Also about a woman’s eagerness to serve her children, obey her husband, and take care of their comfort. The number 190 often comes in a dream, to make the dreamer care about her health and go to the doctor if necessary. Interpretation of seeing the number 190 in a dream about a man and its meaning Seeing the number 190 in a man’s dream means hard work and a quiet life And live in peace, and God knows best. The number 190 also indicates a person’s behavior in his problems and worries, rejecting depression and being optimistic about the future, God willing. Some interpreters say that seeing 190 pounds in a dream is not good and indicates strife, anxiety, and problems in life. The meaning of seeing the number 190 in a dream Pregnant woman and its interpretation: Seeing the number 190 in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy, natural birth, provided that she writes the number down or repeats it in the dream. Writing the number 190 more than once in a dream is good news for the dreamer and her fetus, and that the birth will be on time, God willing. Likewise, whoever sees this number written on a wall Or a sign, it is an unpleasant dream and warns of a difficult birth and severe pain, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing the number 91 in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, or a man. Interpretation of the appearance of the number 190 in a dream for young people and its meaning. Seeing the number 190 in a student’s dream indicates success with high grades and graduation with a good grade, God willing. Whoever is looking for a job and sees the number 190 in his dream, God Almighty will give him a good job commensurate with his abilities. Also, seeing the number 190 in a dream for a young man or a suitor does not bode well and warns that the relationship will end against his will, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the number 180 in a dream: seeing the number 180 in a married man’s dream indicates a good, obedient wife who helps her husband in this world and strengthens him. Whether in a married woman’s dream, the number 180 symbolizes her husband’s love for her and his concern for her, and that the relationship between them is a symbol of tenderness and mercy. It has been stated in some interpretations that the number 180 indicates thinking. In marriage and the search for a suitable partner, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the number 170 in a dream: Either the number 170 in a young man’s dream indicates entering into more than one field of work. Which leads to a loss of focus and mediocre results, and God knows best. The number 170 in a single woman’s dream expresses her preoccupation with others. The important matters in her life related to work and the future, and God knows best. In a married woman’s dream, the number 170 expresses the many tasks and responsibilities placed on her shoulders, which affects her psychology and health.

title: Interpretation of a dream about escaping

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of escaping in a dream through this article. God Almighty said: “O gangsters, inform me of my vision if you are a vision that expresses it.” (43) Dreams come with warnings that may sometimes accompany a few things that can be told to you about some unpleasant matters, and the interpretation of dreams is actually a set of diligences that... The imams of dream interpretation have demonstrated it throughout history, and God Almighty alone knows the unseen, so it is not necessary to rely on him. About the interpretation of dreams in managing the events of her life, and in today’s article in the encyclopedia we present the interpretation of the dream of escaping. Escape to a dreamInterpretation of the dream of escaping by Ibn Sirini Escape in a dream generally indicates brilliant success, abundant goodness that the dreamer will receive in his life, and the great nourishment that God Almighty has granted him. Among other interpretations by Ibn Sirin. Escaping from pursuit in a dream expresses the envy that the dreamer suffers from, which causes many things to stop in his life. If someone sees in a dream that he is escaping from his home. This is a sign that this person will get rid of all the difficulties, problems, and sorrows in his life. And if a married woman sees in her dream that she is leaving her home; This vision symbolizes a woman’s desire to divorce her husband. However, if a person sees in his dream that he succeeds in escaping from his home. This dream portends many problems and difficulties in the coming period. If the dreamer sees in a dream some animals chasing him, such as dogs, snakes of all kinds, birds, lions, tigers, hyenas, and wolves. This vision symbolizes the jealous people who are waiting for him and his life. Escaping from the police in a dream: To dream that he is escaping from the police is one of the praiseworthy visions that promise the dreamer that he will be able to achieve all his dreams and aspirations in all fields. In the event that the person sees himself escaping from the pursuing patrol car. This vision expresses his failure in all the tasks assigned to him. Interpretation of a dream about escaping by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing a person in a dream escaping from a person or from one of his enemies who wants to kill him. This vision shows the dreamer's feeling of fear and anxiety about the future. If the dreamer knows the person he is leaving in the dream. This dream symbolizes a big and sharp confrontation between them in real life soon. If you repeatedly see a stranger running away. This dream is a strong indicator of the dreamer’s fear of the future, and this fear takes on a large dimension in his life. In the event that a person sees himself running away from something he does not know. It is a sign of his difficult life, and that he is uncomfortable, and other interpretations also indicate that it indicates the severe illness that has befallen the dreamer, the fear that he feels, and the problems that he faces. Interpretation of escaping in a dream for a single woman: seeing a single girl in a dream running away from someone. It appears that she will be able to get rid of all the things that hinder her in her life and that put her in a state of stress and anxiety for the future. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is running away and no one is behind her. This indicates her courage and constant pursuit of achieving her dreams. An unmarried girl’s feeling of extreme fear while running away shows that she is afraid of something.

title: Interpretation of gifts in a dream

preview.html: A gift is a sign of love, affection and familiarity. Thus, the encyclopedia presents an article on the interpretation of gifts in a dream. A gift is a gift from one person to another, whether the person is a relative, a lover, or a friend, and the gift removes hatred and hatred in the heart. The Prophet - may God bless him and grant him peace - said: “Have mercy on one another, and love one another, for the gift explodes while the chest is empty.” If it indicates that, it indicates the value of the gift in uniting the hearts and removing the malice in the chest, and God Almighty has recommended the gift in His Noble Book. God Almighty said (You rejoice in your gift), so let us learn together about the interpretation of gifts in a dream. Interpretation of gifts in a dream Interpretation of gifts in a dream in general If a person sees gifts in a dream, this indicates that this person’s life is full of surprises. Because a gift means a surprise. If someone sees in a dream that he is giving a gift to someone. This indicates that this person's life will be miserable because he is offering all his possessions to him. He will not enjoy surprises, so his life will be full of problems. If he sees a stranger who has given him a gift in his dream. This indicates that this person is well-behaved. If someone receives many gifts in a dream. This indicates that this person is loved. If someone receives a gift in a dream, and the fortuneteller does not give it, and the fortuneteller feels jealous. This indicates that the dreamer feels jealous of those close to him. Because of their high level. If one sees many gifts in his dream. This indicates that he should pay attention to himself and do his best in his life. Until he achieves what he wants. If someone sees you opening a gift and you don't like it? This indicates that those around him are deceiving him, or that someone deceived him. And if he finds himself sleeping, he sends a gift in the mail; This shows that he made a wrong decision. As a result, a valuable opportunity was lost.Interpretation of seeing a gift in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees a gift in a dream. This indicates that God Almighty grants her goodness and blessing in her life and the integrity of her family’s affairs. If the married woman does not have children. This indicates that God Almighty will carry her and she will give birth to children. Interpretation of a dream about a gift in a dream for a single woman: If a single woman sees a gift in a dream. This indicates that God blesses her with a good husband who will fill her life with happiness, and they based this on the story of Bilqis and our master Solomon, peace be upon him. When Sulayman Bilqis was given a gift, and the marriage took place after that, the Holy Qur’an mentioned it and said: “And send them a gift.” If a single woman sees that she has received a date in a dream. This is evidence of the imminent engagement of this woman, and if she is engaged, does she have the right to do so? This is evidence that this woman's marriage will be great. If an unmarried woman sees that her boyfriend is giving her a gift. This is evidence that he loves her and will soon confess his love to her. Interpretation of the gift of gold in a dream: If he sees that someone is giving him gold. This is evidence that God Almighty will give the dreamer goodness and blessings, materially and practically. God will give him a lot of money and help him reach the highest positions in his work, and if she is a woman; This is evidence of A
